content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** no gauge is listed in the pattern but it calls for japanese size 3/0 hook 2 3 mm note no gauge but the pattern indicates the chain should be 52 cm which equals 20 4724 inches 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-g741c/
